results.title: How an American Survived Hiding From the Russians in Kherson for 8 Months
results.abstract: Timothy Morales, a teacher, was trapped in the southern Ukrainian city during the occupation. To evade Russian troops, he rarely ventured out, switched apartments and pretended to be Irish.

results.title: Key Allies Are Inching Away From Trump
results.abstract: Early signs suggest he may struggle to win over Republican Party leaders for his third presidential bid, after a string of disappointments, but Donald Trump’s staunchest voters are another matter.
